Company: BC Capital Group S.A., BC Capital Group International Limited, and BC Capital Group Holdings S.A.
Description: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission announced that the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of Illinois entered an Order of Default Judgment against Nikolai S. Battoo, BC Capital Group S.A., BC Capital Group International Limited, and BC Capital Group Holdings S.A. for committing a global commodity futures and options fraud.
